message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $13,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $13,000.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still looking to keep my expenses down. Could we meet at $13,200 for the product?
